channel.title: Elite PvP | Old School Spawn | Pk in Seconds | Perfect Hybridding l STAFF NEEDED
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to Elite PvP.
Old School Spawn Server!Spawn your items, set your skills!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/6qbcdf.png[/img][/CENTER]
[url=http://elitepvp.org/index.php?action=register][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SldbN.png[/img][/url] [url=http://elitepvp.org/webclient.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u58wg.png[/img][/url] [url=http://elitepvp.org/index.php?action=forum][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8cTJL.png[/img][/url]
[COLOR="Yellow"][SIZE="4"]This Server is NOT "Donation based", where you have to donate to get the best items.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[I][FONT="Garamond"][SIZE="3"][COLOR="Cyan"][B]Features[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I] [SPOIL][SIZE="2"][COLOR="White"]- Server is online 24 hours a day and 7 days a week. - Stable and well coded server source, which will hold as many players as possible. 24/7 Pking Great Community Active community 100+ players Hosted 24/7 no lag Chaotics Donator Zone Staff %100 Earned Great Pking Active Owners Great Staff Spirit Shields Vote4Points FREE BANDOS AND AGS!(No Donator requirements!) Much More Join to find out! [/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOIL]
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="SeaGreen"][B]This Server is also not like all these 'leached servers'. It's unique and professional.[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Website[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/forums-1.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Top Pkers[/COLOR][COLOR="Green"] (must have at least 20 kills to be in)[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/kdr.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Automated Vote System[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/vote.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Working Webclient[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/webclient.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Ingame Quest Tab[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/questtab-1.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Vote Shop[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/voteshop.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Pk Point Shop[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/pkpointstore.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Duel Arena - You get 1 Pk Rating for each win.[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/duel.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]PvP Areas[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/pvpareas.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/pktele1.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Teleports[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/teleports.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Quest Tab[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/questtab-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/equip.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Kill Monsters in Donor zone to get PvP Armor more easily.[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/pvparmor.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]::getid (name of item you want)[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/getid.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Yellow"]Pk Ratings are required to wear some armor like these. [COLOR="Lime"]( 1 kill = 1 pk rating )[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n501/chaoticpkz/pkrating.png[/img]
[FONT="Garamond"][SIZE="5"][COLOR="Yellow"]Why is this server is Special to Us?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT] [SPOIL][SIZE="3"][COLOR="Lime"]- A lot of the people miss the old runescape, and hate all this 'korasi, torva, new prayers, all these new, overpowered items into the game. This servers soul purpose is to remove that into a concept where its old school and pking is enjoyable. The newest items are chaotic. It's meant for having huge clan battles and is more than capable of having it because of how stable the server is. The more you pk, the more your known, and if you have 20 or more kills, you are automatically put into the 'Top Pkers' section on the forums. The combat is near perfect and don't even get me started on the switching. Also, there aren't much old school spawn servers around, and I was hoping this would work towards what old school pk lovers really want. Well, that's why this server is so special to us and we hope you enjoy your stay and make sure to vote everyday so this server can grow! [/COLOR][/SPOIL][/SIZE]
[/CENTER][/center]

item.title: Elite PvP | Old School Spawn | Pk in Seconds | Perfect Hybridding l STAFF NEEDED
item.dc:creator: @magestpure magestpure
item.description:
@magestpure wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:9, topic:451943”][quote author=magestpure link=topic=554826.msg4064121#msg4064121 date=1343701842]

Like the server, although it needs more players. i plan in sticking around

Awesome, thanks. Yeh yesterday was the first day of it’s release.
[/quote]As a suggestion, remove turmoil if you want it to be old school.[/quote]

By old school, i don’t mean 2006 i mean 2010 cause their are chaotics too.

Read full topic

item.description:
@magestpure wrote:

[center]Welcome to Elite PvP.

Old School Spawn Server!Spawn your items, set your skills!

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[COLOR=“Yellow”][SIZE=“4”]This Server is NOT “Donation based”, where you have to donate to get the best items.[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[FONT=“Garamond”][SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“Cyan”]Features[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SPOIL][SIZE=“2”][COLOR=“White”]- Server is online 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.

  • Stable and well coded server source, which will hold as many players as possible.
    24/7 Pking
    Great Community
    Active community
    100+ players
    Hosted 24/7 no lag
    Chaotics
    Donator Zone
    Staff %100 Earned
    Great Pking
    Active Owners
    Great Staff
    Spirit Shields
    Vote4Points
    FREE BANDOS AND AGS!(No Donator requirements!)
    Much More Join to find out!
    [/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOIL]

[SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“SeaGreen”]This Server is also not like all these ‘leached servers’. It’s unique and professional.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Website[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Top Pkers[/COLOR][COLOR=“Green”] (must have at least 20 kills to be in)[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Automated Vote System[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Working Webclient[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Ingame Quest Tab[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Vote Shop[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Pk Point Shop[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Duel Arena - You get 1 Pk Rating for each win.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]PvP Areas[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Teleports[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Quest Tab[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Kill Monsters in Donor zone to get PvP Armor more easily.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]::getid (name of item you want)[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Pk Ratings are required to wear some armor like these. [COLOR=“Lime”]( 1 kill = 1 pk rating )[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[FONT=“Garamond”][SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Why is this server is Special to Us?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SPOIL][SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“Lime”]- A lot of the people miss the old runescape, and hate all this 'korasi, torva, new prayers, all these new, overpowered items into the game. This servers soul purpose is to remove that into a concept where its old school and pking is enjoyable. The newest items are chaotic. It’s meant for having huge clan battles and is more than capable of having it because of how stable the server is. The more you pk, the more your known, and if you have 20 or more kills, you are automatically put into the ‘Top Pkers’ section on the forums. The combat is near perfect and don’t even get me started on the switching. Also, there aren’t much old school spawn servers around, and I was hoping this would work towards what old school pk lovers really want. Well, that’s why this server is so special to us and we hope you enjoy your stay and make sure to vote everyday so this server can grow! [/COLOR][/SPOIL][/SIZE]

[/CENTER][/center]
